messages.welcomeMessage:
GET OUT

Developed by Bruno Ortiz
A game based on the text adventure Zork

Use the HELP command to learn how to play
Note: You may find it useful to draw a map as you go.

--------------------------------------------------

You find yourself in an unfamiliar place, uncertain of where you are or how you got there.
You can see a door on the southern side of the room and hear some noises coming from the other side.
messages.gameEndMessage:
As you remove the heavy triple lock from the door, you can hear footsteps on the other side.
You quickly open the door and are blinded by a very bright white light.
While trying to adjust to the extreme lighting, you feel a needle in your neck.
As you fall down to the ground, fainting, you hear a rather high-pitched voice saying:
'THE EXIT IS A LIE'.

...

Well, you finished the game.
It's probably not the ending you expected, but at least you have some closure now.
